radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlargement of the right atrial and right ventricular silhouettes; proximal pulmonary arterial branches appear enlarged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive enlargement of the right atrial and pulmonary vessels compared to a previous roentgenograph from 3 years earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal size of the left side of the heart and normal left ventricular function; right atrial and right ventricular dilatation with moderate global right ventricular hypokinesis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated progression of right-sided heart failure.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Communication between the left atrium and the superior vena cava; identification of an anomalous right superior pulmonary vein.
Defined the course of the anomalous right superior pulmonary vein and confirmed the superior sinus venosus defect.
Decreased right ventricular size; Dacron patch visible in the posterior right atrium.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in right ventricular dimensions post-surgery.
